name:
MY AQUARIUM:
SEVEN OCEANS
description:
Depart to the conquest of the worldâ€™s biggest fishing spots and bring back with you the rarest species.

Adjust your fish tanks and change the parameters of the water in order to make your fishes happy to be there. Like real fishes, they will need good care!

Tropical and River fishes, mammals like dolphins and whales, many fishing spots to discover, various others fishermen to meet and a lot of objects and effects to decorate your fish tanks.

You can even exchange fishes and fishing notes with your friends!
disclaimer: You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
